title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.48 - Unattended aircraft to be secured in approved manner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.48 - Unattended aircraft to be secured in approved manner

State Regulations

No person shall park an aircraft or leave the same
standing on a public landing area, public ramp and apron area, public passenger
ramp and apron area, public cargo ramp and apron area, public aircraft parking
and storage area, or operational area at an air terminal except at such places
as may be prescribed or permitted by the Port Authority. When in public storage
areas, those aircraft for which fittings are provided shall be required to make
proper use thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.48

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
